div.p: National Archives, London, CO 309/70, Original Correspondence Victoria, 1864, vol. 5, Office and Independent, ff. 471-2.

Annotated: '11723 Victoria' and 'Answered privately by Mr Parker' (letter not found). The letter is stamped ‘received 22 Dec 1864’. Associated minutes draw attention to '5003/63 from Sir Henry Barkly' [see M to H. Barkly, 23 March 1863 (in this edition as 63-03-23c), and notes thereto] and ask 'Mr. Englehead' to dispose of them.
Melbourne botanic

div.p: I have the honor to remain
